org.jawin.util
Class HexFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.jawin.util.HexFormatter
public class HexFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class for doing hex dumps of arrays to String. Useful for debugging, esp. on IDEs that are not hex-friendly.
